scripts.uglify:css: echo 'Uglifying CSS files...' && mkdir -p client/public/dist && uglifycss client/public/assets/vendors/custom/css/custom-style.css --output client/public/dist/custom-style.min.css client/public/Bootstrap/dist/css/latestBootstrap.css client/public/assets/Emoji/picker.css client/public/assets/dashboard/dashboard.css --output client/public/dist/kibopush.min.css && echo 'Done compiling reactjs file'
